name: Reforged Remembrance
descHash:
Light the candles, spread the cards, breathe in the fragrance...
These broken memories become faces in the dancing light.
The apparitions that emerge from flames tell her of pasts fondly recalled.
Time is shorn. The moment is frozen. She turns these most precious instants into crystallizations of eternity.

"There is too much lost, and too little that remains... We nurture remembrance against the cruelties of time."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

549438.name: Extinguished Core
549438.desc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Crude material used for enhancement.
549438.lore:
It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion.
A heavy blow has caused this heart to stop beating and lose its luster.

"Preliminary tests indicate it's some kind of hybrid: One half is primordial, and the other half is something very similar to Stellarons." — Department of Biology, Sarah Castro
comeFrom: Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

589818.name: Starfire Essence
589818.desc: A mature heliobus that ran away after the Flaming Catastrophe War. Used to level up Traces moderately for Nihility characters.
589818.lore:
A mean and nasty heliobus that appears like a full flame.
The size of a heliobus's flame when it materializes indicates its strength. This torch-like heliobus has just tasted consciousness and is eager to devour its host's emotions and desires.

"Absorb their emotions and sway their wills..."

633379.name: Glimmering Core
633379.desc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Normal material used for enhancement.
633379.lore:
It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion.
The heart is glimmering and the veins on it indicate it's still alive.

"What kind of monster is this? Did you see it... Its face! It has the face of our previous leader!"
comeFrom: Certain Fragmentum Monsters at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

673759.name: Heaven Incinerator
673759.desc: A beast-form heliobus that homogenized after the Flaming Catastrophe War. Used to level up Traces significantly for Nihility characters.
673759.lore:
An intelligent and powerful heliobus that has started to take the form of a beast.
The size of a heliobus's flame when it materializes indicates its strength. A large heliobus, having homogenized its numerous lesser peers, will gradually have a stable shape. These immortal beings can become so dangerous that they are considered calamities.

"Floods, fires, landslides, and thunderstorms..."

694487.name: Refined Aether
694487.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>6000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694487.lore:
A canister of aether that has been extracted and distilled using special procedures.

"The Garden looks forward to recreating a past glory, but it is a 'past glory' selected by them. Do you understand?"

694488.name: Condensed Aether
694488.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>2000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694488.lore:
A can of Aether refined through special techniques.

"Handle with care, do not drop or place pressure upon it. If damages and leaks occur, please refer to chapter II of the Leak Disaster Response Manual for emergency response."

694489.name: Sparse Aether
694489.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>500</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694489.lore:
An imaginary substance that shouldn't exist in reality. The basic material to create Light Cones.
The images contained in the Light Cones become clearer when infused with this substance.

"I see, so this is the supposed 'memoria' of the Garden of Recollection. No wonder the Memokeepers can set off on galactic voyages with memories."

717320.name: Squirming Core
717320.desc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717320.lore:
It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion.
The heart is pulsating slowly, with a residual force powerful enough to cause a new calamity. It's best to destroy it to prevent further troubles.

"It's like a cancer..."
comeFrom: Certain Fragmentum Monsters at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

874345.name: Fiery Spirit
874345.desc: Feeble heliobus that scattered after the Flaming Catastrophe War. Used to level up Traces slightly for Nihility characters.
874345.lore:
An innocent, formless heliobus.
The size of a heliobus's flame when it materializes indicates its strength. This little heliobus is innocent and naive and may be easily consumed by more powerful heliobi.

"Formless, rootless, and roaming boundless..."

skill.name: Crystallize
skill.descHash: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by #1[i]%. When the wearer deals DMG to an enemy inflicted with Wind Shear, Burn, Shock, or Bleed, each respectively grants 1 stack of Prophet, stacking up to #4[i] time(s). In a single battle, only 1 stack of Prophet can be granted for each type of DoT. Every stack of Prophet increases wearer's ATK by #2[i]% and enables the DoT dealt to ignore #3[f1]% of the target's DEF.
